1: <sup>1</sup> Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
2: <sup>2</sup> Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God.
3: <sup>3</sup> Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.
4: <sup>4</sup> For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.
5: <sup>5</sup> For I know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.
6: <sup>6</sup> Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
7: <sup>7</sup> He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
8: <sup>8</sup> Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.
9: <sup>9</sup> Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
10: <sup>10</sup> Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;
11: <sup>11</sup> Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:
12: <sup>12</sup> And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.
13: <sup>13</sup> Thy name, O LORD, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.
14: <sup>14</sup> For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.
15: <sup>15</sup> The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
16: <sup>16</sup> They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;
17: <sup>17</sup> They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
18: <sup>18</sup> They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.
19: <sup>19</sup> Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:
20: <sup>20</sup> Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
21: <sup>21</sup> Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
